predicate.note: Frames file for 'fell' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. Very specific usage.

roleset.name: cause to fall down

example.name: passive
example.text: Richard Secord, the retired Air Force general felled *trace* in the Iran-Contra scandal, is all but ruined -- forced to sell his Virginia home and pull his kids out of college, according to a recent fund-raising appeal sent out on his behalf.

roleset.note: Another example of old Germanic ablaut as making a causative verb (set/sit(/seat), raise/rise being the others). Beautiful!
